summary: You can now steal the items the trader in Riverwood sells.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction:
This is my first mod and as I was learning how
to use the creation kit I saw that there
is a chest which is normaly invisible.

In the chest are the goods from the trader and I
placed it upstairs so that you are able to steal them.

Installation:
Extact the *.esp file into the folder \"data\".
This is normally \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\".
Then tick StealFromRiverwoodTader.esp at the Skyrim launcher.
author: JimJava
